data.name: GetProperties
data.value: SELECT DISTINCT a1.NewType as TypeName, a1.COLUMN_NAME as PropertyName, a1.IsPrimaryKey, a1.Is_identity as IsIdentitySeed, a1.Is_Computed as IsComputed, a1.ORDINAL_POSITION FROM ( /*using top because i'm putting an order by ordinal_position on it. putting a top on it is the only way for a subquery to be ordered*/ SELECT TOP 100 PERCENT c.COLUMN_NAME, c.TABLE_NAME, c.TABLE_SCHEMA, c.DATA_TYPE, c.IS_NULLABLE, c.ORDINAL_POSITION, col.is_identity, col.is_computed, CASE WHEN pk.COLUMN_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as IsPrimaryKey, CASE WHEN c.DATA_TYPE = 'varchar' THEN 'string' WHEN c.DATA_TYPE = 'nvarchar' THEN 'string' WHEN c.DATA_TYPE = 'datetime' AND c.IS_NULLABLE = 'NO' THEN 'DateTime' WHEN c.DATA_TYPE = 'datetime' AND c.IS_NULLABLE = 'YES' THEN 'DateTime?' WHEN c.DATA_TYPE = 'datetime2' AND c.IS_NULLABLE = 'NO' THEN 'DateTime' WHEN c.DATA_TYPE = 'datetime2' AND c.IS_NULLABLE = 'YES' THEN 'DateTime?' WHEN c.DATA_TYPE = 'int' AND c.IS_NULLABLE = 'YES' THEN 'int?' WHEN c.DATA_TYPE = 'int' AND c.IS_NULLABLE = 'NO' THEN 'int' WHEN c.DATA_TYPE = 'smallint' AND c.IS_NULLABLE = 'NO' THEN 'short' WHEN c.DATA_TYPE = 'smallint' AND c.IS_NULLABLE = 'YES' THEN 'short?' WHEN c.DATA_TYPE = 'decimal' AND c.IS_NULLABLE = 'NO' THEN 'decimal' WHEN c.DATA_TYPE = 'decimal' AND c.IS_NULLABLE = 'YES' THEN 'decimal?' WHEN c.DATA_TYPE = 'numeric' AND c.IS_NULLABLE = 'NO' THEN 'decimal' WHEN c.DATA_TYPE = 'numeric' AND c.IS_NULLABLE = 'YES' THEN 'decimal?' WHEN c.DATA_TYPE = 'real' AND c.IS_NULLABLE = 'NO' THEN 'decimal' WHEN c.DATA_TYPE = 'real' AND c.IS_NULLABLE = 'YES' THEN 'decimal?' WHEN c.DATA_TYPE = 'float' AND c.IS_NULLABLE = 'NO' THEN 'double' WHEN c.DATA_TYPE = 'float' AND c.IS_NULLABLE = 'YES' THEN 'double?' WHEN c.DATA_TYPE = 'money' AND c.IS_NULLABLE = 'NO' THEN 'decimal' WHEN c.DATA_TYPE = 'money' AND c.IS_NULLABLE = 'YES' THEN 'decimal?' WHEN c.DATA_TYPE = 'bigint' AND c.IS_NULLABLE = 'NO' THEN 'long' WHEN c.DATA_TYPE = 'bigint' AND c.IS_NULLABLE = 'YES' THEN 'long?' WHEN c.DATA_TYPE = 'tinyint' AND c.IS_NULLABLE = 'NO' THEN 'byte' WHEN c.DATA_TYPE = 'tinyint' AND c.IS_NULLABLE = 'YES' THEN 'byte?' WHEN c.DATA_TYPE = 'char' THEN 'string' WHEN c.DATA_TYPE = 'timestamp' THEN 'byte[]' WHEN c.DATA_TYPE = 'varbinary' THEN 'byte[]' WHEN c.DATA_TYPE = 'bit' AND c.IS_NULLABLE = 'NO' THEN 'bool' WHEN c.DATA_TYPE = 'bit' AND c.IS_NULLABLE = 'YES' THEN 'bool?' WHEN c.DATA_TYPE = 'xml' THEN 'string' WHEN c.DATA_TYPE = 'image' THEN 'byte[]' WHEN c.DATA_TYPE = 'uniqueidentifier' AND c.IS_NULLABLE = 'NO' THEN 'Guid' WHEN c.DATA_TYPE = 'uniqueidentifier' AND c.IS_NULLABLE = 'YES' THEN 'Guid?' WHEN c.DATA_TYPE = 'text' THEN 'string' END AS NewType FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS c join sys.schemas sch on c.Table_Schema=sch.Name join sys.Tables tbl on sch.Schema_ID=tbl.Schema_ID and c.Table_Name=tbl.Name join sys.columns col on tbl.object_id=col.object_id and col.Name=c.COLUMN_NAME LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ku.TABLE_CATALOG,ku.TABLE_SCHEMA,ku.TABLE_NAME,ku.COLUMN_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLE_CONSTRAINTS AS tc INNER JOIN INFORMATION_SCHEMA.KEY_COLUMN_USAGE AS ku ON tc.CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'PRIMARY KEY' AND tc.CONSTRAINT_NAME = ku.CONSTRAINT_NAME ) pk ON c.TABLE_CATALOG = pk.TABLE_CATALOG AND c.TABLE_SCHEMA = pk.TABLE_SCHEMA AND c.TABLE_NAME = pk.TABLE_NAME AND c.COLUMN_NAME = pk.COLUMN_NAME WHERE c.TABLE_NAME = '{0}' AND c.TABLE_SCHEMA = '{1}' ORDER BY c.ORDINAL_POSITION ) AS a1 order by IsPrimaryKey desc, ORDINAL_POSITION
